value.stringValue: Thank you for registering for HeartKids Connect

Thank you for registering for HeartKids Connect! Your submission has been received and is currently being reviewed by our team. Please keep an eye on your inbox for further communications. If you donâ€™t see an email from us within the next two days, kindly check your junk or spam folder. If you need any assistance, feel free to reach out to us at community@heartkids.org.au. Thank you! HeartKids team.
A new contact has entered Salesforce via the Salesforce/Online Community Entry form. Review required to progress Online Community registration.

formulas.description: This formula get the 13 years old date from today.
formulas.name: Age_Calculator
IsPrimaryCarer
formulas.expression: IF({!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD} == 'Heart Angel Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD} == 'Heart Kid Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD1} == 'Heart Angel Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD1} == 'Heart Kid Parent/Carer', true, false)

formulas.name: IsPrimaryContact
formulas.expression: IF({!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD} == 'Heart Angel Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD} == 'Heart Kid Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD1} == 'Heart Angel Parent/Carer' || {!Personal_Connection_to_CoHD1} == 'Heart Kid Parent/Carer', false, true)

fields.fieldText: Duplicate records found on the form. Please make sure First Name, Last Name and Email should be different.

fields.name: Form_Label
fields.fieldText: HeartKids Online Community Sign-up

fields.name: Into_Text
fields.fieldText: By joining HeartKids Connect, you agree to receive communications from HeartKids to keep you informed about important updates, events, and resources. Once logged in to HeartKids Connect, youâ€™ll also have the option to customise your notification preferences from the online community.

validationRule.errorMessage: {!Email_Error_Msg}

fields.name: SuccessMsg
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for registering for HeartKids Connect! To keep our community secure, we manually verify each and every application that comes in. Sometimes this can take us a day or two, so please be patient. If we need any more information, we will contact you directly.


Once your account has been approved, you will receive another email from us inviting you to login and set a password on your new account. Don't forget to check your junk folder if you don't see this email within a couple of days.

textTemplates.name: ChildEmailDeclaration
textTemplates.text: We only occasionally contact young people with age-appropriate, specially designed resources and information, and we never include fundraising requests in these communications.

value.stringValue: Please enter a past date for D.O.B.
Please enter a valid email address.
